Mission

I/O Doctors, LLC is dedicated to providing users of Linux high performance computer (HPC) applications with an understanding of their applications' I/O behavior and potential optimization solutions, without changes to existing hardware or software.

    Lead Developer

  • John Bauer

    John is the primary designer and developer for our toolset.

    He started his career at Hughes Aircraft, as an aeronautical engineer. (As he likes to say, he really is a “rocket scientist”) He quickly displayed a talent for software engineering, and went on to combine these skills at Cray Research, where he did pioneering work optimizing finite element applications on supercomputers. Later at IBM, John continued his success, helping build IBM’s strength in HPC. John brings a unique perspective to our work. As both a software engineer, and a mechanical/aeronautical engineer, he understands both the needs of the users, and the software that meets those needs.

    Over the years, John has enjoyed many long-term relationships with customers, bringing I/O optimization to successive generations of HPC hardware and software.


    • Founder and CEO
    • MS Mechanical Enigneering, UCLA
    • BS Aeronautical & Astronautical Engineering, Purdue University
